definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: It used to be called "The Land of Fire" because it is so hot in summer.
sentences.chinese: 它曾被人們稱作“火洲”，因爲在夏天這裏十分炎熱。

sentences.english: It in the test of whether we can fit the summer heat and winter cold.
sentences.chinese: 它在考驗我們是否能適合夏季的炎熱和冬季的寒冷。

sentences.english: I reminded myself then and there that in the cold of the winter I would wish I had this heat.
sentences.chinese: 立即告訴站在嚴寒裏的自己，希望能擁有夏季的炎熱。

sentences.english: How can I spend my time in such a hot day without air-conditioning?
sentences.chinese: 這樣炎熱的天，沒有冷氣，怎麼過呀？

sentences.english: But the hot days of summer had dried up all the mountain brooks.
sentences.chinese: 可是夏季的炎熱天氣已經把所有的山澗小溪都曬乾了。

sentences.english: One day he saw a farmer working in the field. The farmer was working very hard under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看到一位農民叔叔在炎熱的天氣下地幹活兒。

sentences.english: When the hot weather hits many people decide to go to the beaches and to cabins by lakes.
sentences.chinese: 當炎熱的天氣訪問許多人決定去海灘和艙房的湖泊。

sentences.english: Even in winter it is blisteringly hot.
sentences.chinese: 即使是冬天這裏依然炎熱異常。

sentences.english: It was too hot without a breath of wind.
sentences.chinese: 天氣很炎熱，連一絲風也沒有。

sentences.english: Hot weather indisposed a man to work hard.
sentences.chinese: 炎熱的天氣使人不願意辛勤地工作。

sentences.english: "Angelology" is proving to be one of the hotter literary properties in a while.
sentences.chinese: “天使”被證明是一個炎熱的文學性質的一段時間。

sentences.english: On a hot summer day an elderly gentleman faints in the street. A small
sentences.chinese: 在一個炎熱的夏天，一位上了年紀的男子昏倒在街頭。

sentences.english: China is always so hot in the summer season; once again descend into a palace otaku.
sentences.chinese: 中國的夏天永遠是那麼炎熱，再一次淪落成深宮宅男。

sentences.english: The dry undergrowth was set alight by the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥的林下植物被炎熱的太陽點燃了。

sentences.english: The hot weather has soured the milk.
sentences.chinese: 炎熱的天氣使牛奶變酸了。

sentences.english: If you're an avid exerciser or live in a hot climate, you may need more.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愛好運動或者居住環境炎熱，需要的就更多。
